Introducing Activity Planner, the ultimate Android app for organizing and planning your activities effortlessly.

Stay organized with essential activity details, including name, time, description, and location.

Enhance your free time activities by uploading, capturing, or downloading multiple images directly from your device.

For travel activities, easily view the location on a map to get a precise idea of the city or area.

Effortlessly track and manage your activities with a convenient calendar view.

Browse activities in a chronological list format, searchable by activity name for quick access.

Receive timely notifications and reminders for upcoming activities, customizable to your preferences.

Personalize your app experience with language selection and notification settings.

Enjoy localization and internationalization, supporting Serbian and English languages.

Ensure optimal app performance with asynchronous execution for tasks that could potentially block the main thread.

Responsive design for various screen densities and sizes, accommodating both phones and tablets.

Experience a minimalistic and visually appealing user interface following the latest design trends.

Seamlessly adapt to both portrait and landscape orientations for a consistent user experience.

Efficiently test the app on different emulator devices to ensure compatibility.
